products.name: Silk Evening Gown
products.about: This exquisite evening gown is meticulously handcrafted from the finest mulberry silk. Each piece takes over 40 hours to create, featuring intricate beadwork and a flowing silhouette that embodies timeless elegance. Perfect for galas, weddings, and sophisticated evening events.

products.name: Italian Leather Jacket
products.about: Crafted from premium Italian leather, this jacket represents the pinnacle of luxury outerwear. The leather is vegetable-tanned using traditional methods passed down through generations. Features include YKK zippers, quilted lining, and a timeless design that improves with age.

products.name: Designer Handbag
products.about: Limited edition designer handbag featuring hand-stitched construction and gold-plated hardware. This piece is part of our exclusive collection with only 100 pieces produced worldwide. Each bag is numbered and comes with a certificate of authenticity.
products.care: Wipe with soft cloth, avoid water

products.name: Cashmere Sweater
products.about: Made from pure Mongolian cashmere, this sweater offers unparalleled softness and warmth. Each piece requires the wool from three goats and undergoes a 14-step manufacturing process. The result is a luxury essential that will last for decades.
products.care: Hand wash cold, lay flat to dry

products.name: Bespoke Tailored Suit
products.about: This bespoke suit is tailored to your exact measurements using Super 150s wool from the finest Italian mills. Includes two in-person fittings to ensure perfect fit. Features hand-stitched lapels, functioning buttonholes, and custom lining options.

products.name: Diamond Necklace
products.about: An exquisite piece featuring 5 carats of VS1 clarity diamonds set in 18K white gold. Each diamond is hand-selected and ethically sourced. This necklace is a timeless investment piece that will be treasured for generations.

products.name: Velvet Tuxedo Jacket
products.about: An elegant velvet tuxedo jacket crafted from rich Italian velvet. Perfect for evening galas and black-tie events, it features silk lapels and a precision-tailored fit that embodies understated luxury.

products.name: Handwoven Silk Scarf
products.about: This handwoven silk scarf is made by artisans using centuries-old techniques. Lightweight and luxurious, it drapes beautifully and adds sophistication to any outfit.
products.care: Dry clean or hand wash cold

products.name: Platinum Chronograph Watch
products.about: An heirloom-quality platinum chronograph featuring Swiss automatic movement, sapphire crystal glass, and crocodile leather strap. Water-resistant up to 100 meters. Limited to 50 pieces globally.
products.material: Platinum Case, Sapphire Glass, Crocodile Leather
products.care: Wipe with dry cloth, avoid moisture

footer.about: The CRUSTWOOD COLLECTION represents the pinnacle of luxury fashion. Since 2010, we have been crafting exceptional pieces that blend timeless elegance with contemporary design.
